name: online-cinema-platform
description: Online Cinema Platform with Next.js frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt'
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --port 8000'"
